title: User wants to see same treatment of Placement Date as for Recertification Dates
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the Recertification Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user views a Placement Date associated with row for a player
custom_expected:
THEN Placement Date displayed in the Recertification form should follow the coloring as the Recertifications due. (Ex: blue hyperlink if everything is good, and the TBD color if they are missing the SFD attachment
AND the Original placement date should also be a hyperlink to the associated transaction and open the transaction on click
AND header filter should take into account the state of the SFD exactly the same as it is for the Recertifications Due

title: Adjustments to Recertification Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND there are one or more recertifications due for players
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the recertification widget
custom_expected:
THEN "SFD not received" color should be updated to #daa520 
AND "SFD not received" font-weight should be updated to 600
AND "Recertifications past due, SFD not received" color should be updated to "SFD not received"
AND "Recertifications past due, SFD not received" font weight should be updated to 600
AND  bolded "future" recertifications should be un-bolded and simply display as black text
AND future recertifications should also be a hyperlink and should open a new preliminary recertification for the next recertification due date (inclusive of the future date)
AND  future recertifications should have the title set to "Click to recertify player"

title: SFD Checkbox Changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC 
AND user is viewing one of the following transactions:
 MJ Recertifications
 MJ Place on 15 Day DL
 MJ Place on 60 Day DL
 MJ DL transfers (15 and 60)
AND "Received SFD" checkbox is present on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the transaction reaches post-submission or post-approval status
custom_expected: THEN club and BOC user should be able to edit the "Received SFD" checkbox

title: Club user should not be able to edit Received SFD checkbox before uploading SFD file
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club user
AND user is viewing one of the following transactions:
MJ Recertifications
MJ Place on 15 Day DL
MJ Place on 60 Day DL
MJ DL transfers (15 and 60)
AND "Received SFD" checkbox is present on the form
BUT a file with upload label "Standard Form of Diagnosis" has not been uploaded
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to check the "Received SFD" checkbox
custom_expected:
THEN user should not be able to check the checkbox
BUT once user uploads a file with appropriate label the user should be able to edit the checkbox

title: Receive error if placement date is back dated more than 5 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Place on 60-Day DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 5 days or more before the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 5 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if placement date is future dated more than 5 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Place on 60-Day DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 5 days or more after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 5 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: BOC user wants to approve Return from Rehab tx for Suspended/Assigned players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player 
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = RHBRT Description = Return from Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND If playerâ€™s MN roster status was Suspended/Assigned, then player's MN roster status should be set to Suspended.
AND Rehab Club should be set to null

title: BOC user wants to reject Return from Rehab tx for Suspended/Assigned players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is viewing a Submitted "Return from Rehab" tx
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's Rehab Club should be set to value in history prior to transaction submission
AND pending Player History entry should be removed

title: Error message if Placement Date is backdated more than 5 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day DL transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 5 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 5 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction  (BOC ONLY)

title: Error message if Placement Date is future dated more than 5 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a Place on 7-Day DL transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 5 or more days after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 5 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)
